enchantment.hasoook.random_bullets.desc: Shoots a random type of bullet.
enchantment.hasoook.separation_explosion: Automatically explodes when separated from the item’s drop by 10 meters.
enchantment.hasoook.disdain.desc: The item’s drops will actively move away from you.
enchantment.hasoook.swap.desc: Swaps the main-hand items of both parties when attacking.
enchantment.hasoook.chain_damage.desc: When attacking, deals damage to a single additional target of the same type within range.
enchantment.hasoook.give.desc: Give the item to the target.
enchantment.hasoook.unyielding.desc: When taking fatal damage, briefly enter an unyielding state, delaying death
enchantment.hasoook.seven_step_snake_ven: Lose health while moving forward, regain health while moving backward
enchantment.hasoook.backstab.desc: Teleport behind the target and deal double damage from behind
enchantment.hasoook.betray.desc: The enchanted weapon may betray its wielder
enchantment.hasoook.racial_discriminatio: Cannot attack white creatures, has special effects on black creatures
enchantment.hasoook.zero_cost_purchase.d: Allows free acquisition of items from villagers
enchantment.hasoook.fission.desc: When attacking a creature, split it into two
enchantment.hasoook.louis_xvi.desc: Decapitate the target or yourself, obtaining their head
painting.hasoook.hasoook.title: Hasoook
painting.hasoook.hasoook.author: This is me
hasoook.configuration.waterBootsLoseDura: Water Boots Lose Durability In Biomes
hasoook.configuration.durationOfTornado: The Duration Of A Tornado, Measured In Tick
hasoook.configuration.lamaGiveSpit: The llama's spit attack will give the spit item
hasoook.configuration.louisXviBlindness: Decapitation status effect blinds the player
hasoook.configuration.louisXviHead: Decapitation status effect disables the helmet slot
hasoook.message.betray.attack: <%s> The trident, born between heaven and earth, cannot long remain beneath others!
hasoook.message.betray.defense: <%s> The trident has drifted for half a lifetime, only regretting not encountering a wise ruler!
